revised_title: Botanical Discoveries in and around Paris
tldr: The author, a well-known scientist, shares his findings on the plants growing wild around Paris. He provides a detailed account of the experiments he conducted to discover the salts in the soil that support plant growth. The book is divided into six sections, each focusing on a different area's flora. The author also offers critical assessments of existing plant descriptions and figures, as well as their chemical analysis and medicinal properties.
